languages.text: "Я принимаю твое правосудие и благодарю Императора, что Он даровал мне шанс послужить Ему еще немного".
"I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."
languages.original_text: "Я принимаю твое правосудие и благодарю Императора, что Он даровал мне шанс послужить Ему еще немного".

traits.locale_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “我接受你的判决。感谢帝皇给我这个机会，让我能为祂多效力一段时间。”
languages.original_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."

traits.locale_text: “我接受你的判决。感谢帝皇给我这个机会，让我能为祂多效力一段时间。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「その判断を受け入れよう。皇帝に少しでも長く仕える機会を与えてくださったことに感謝する」
languages.original_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."

traits.locale_text: 「その判断を受け入れよう。皇帝に少しでも長く仕える機会を与えてくださったことに感謝する」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Acepto su juicio y agradezco al Emperador esta oportunidad de servirle un poco más».
languages.original_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."

traits.locale_text: «Acepto su juicio y agradezco al Emperador esta oportunidad de servirle un poco más».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich akzeptiere Euer Urteil und danke dem Imperator für diese Chance, ihm noch etwas länger zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."

traits.locale_text: "Ich akzeptiere Euer Urteil und danke dem Imperator für diese Chance, ihm noch etwas länger zu dienen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « J'accepte votre jugement et je remercie l'Empereur pour cette chance de Le servir un peu plus longuement. »
languages.original_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."

traits.locale_text: « J'accepte votre jugement et je remercie l'Empereur pour cette chance de Le servir un peu plus longuement. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Hükmünü kabul ediyor ve İmparator'a şükrediyorum. O'na bir süre daha hizmet etme şansına sahip olacağım."
languages.original_text: "I accept your judgement and thank the Emperor for this chance to serve Him a little longer."

traits.locale_text: "Hükmünü kabul ediyorum ve İmparator'a şükrediyorum. O'na bir süre daha hizmet etme şansına sahip olacağım."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
